flex2.tools.oem.Configuration

  • Packages that use Configuration 
    Package Description
    flex2.tools.flexbuilder  
    flex2.tools.oem

    • Uses of Configuration in flex2.tools.flexbuilder

      Classes in flex2.tools.flexbuilder that implement Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BuilderConfiguration
      This class represents a flex2.tools.oem.Configuration wrapper, so the code in BuilderConfiguration basically delegates calls to the underlying Configuration object.

    • Uses of Configuration in flex2.tools.oem

    • Uses of Configuration in flex2.tools.oem.internal

      Classes in flex2.tools.oem.internal that implement Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OEMConfiguration
      A ToolsConfiguration wrapper, which provides strongly typed configuration getters and setters, which internally storing them loosely typed for later processing.
